tool_description: Generates optimal bitrate encoding profiles based on video characteristics and target delivery scenarios for adaptive streaming.

quality_levels.description: Number of quality levels to generate (3-8)

error_messages: Invalid video dimensions: Width and height must be positive integers
Invalid complexity score: Must be between 0.0 and 10.0
Invalid quality levels: Must be between 3 and 8
Empty target devices: Provide at least one target device category
Invalid target device: Use supported device categories (mobile, tablet, desktop, tv, gaming)
usage: Input video metadata and target delivery requirements to generate optimized bitrate profiles for adaptive streaming across different devices and network conditions.

bitrates_kbps.description: Recommended bitrates in kilobits per second

estimated_file_sizes_mb.description: Estimated file sizes in megabytes for each profile
